name: Perfect Plugin Picker
author: Joe Anzalone

sections.description: Shows you how many ratings a plugin has received without having to hover over the stars in your site’s admin panel when browsing for a new plugin. Additional enhancements are coming soon as well!
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the plugin from the “Plugins” page.

short_description: Displays the number of ratings a plugin has received without having to hover over the stars in your site's admin panel when browsing for plugins.
description: Shows you how many ratings a plugin has received without having to hover over the stars in your site’s admin panel when browsing for a new plugin. Additional enhancements are coming soon as well!

screenshots.caption: The number of ratings each plugin has received is displayed below the star rating itself.
